_sText:
GG_awesome

 Hello everyone, I have yet released another Gun Game map for Counter Strike Source ^^ So this time I tried a new and colorful style, with only custom textures that I created my self, except the skybox. So the Counter terrorist start off at the green house and the terrorists in the yellow/orange house. There are tunnels that leads to each side and there are one tunnel on each side of the map, and it's balanced aswell. ^^ So the basic theme of the map is some of the colors from the awesome face that most of you know or have heard about :D and also all the textures on this map except the skybox is made by me ^^ The map includes: - 3D skybox - Custom texturs - Rotating brushes - tunnels - 32 players - "Hidden" grenades - Awesomness! Here is the movie I created, so you can have a glimpse of it before you test it ^^ I just put that song in there for the lulz xD hope you like it ^^ Brought to you by:
